php.LBL_WOOCOMMERCE_DESCRIPTION: Integration with the WooCommerce - Open Source eCommerce Platform
php.LBL_WOOCOMMERCE_ALERT: It is recommended to perform all configuration changes before starting synchronization. Changes performed while synchronization is in progress may cause errors.
php.LBL_SYNC_CURRENCY_TOOLTIP: Synchronization works only in one direction, if there is no WooCommerce currency in the system, it adds it to the system.
php.LBL_SYNC_CATEGORIES_TOOLTIP: Category synchronization is be done by using the Product category module.
php.LBL_SYNC_TAGS_TOOLTIP: Tag synchronization is done by using the multiselect picklist.
php.LBL_SHIPPING_SERVICE_ID_TOOLTIP:
Additional item in invoice or order when there is a delivery cost.
The value is downloaded from the delivery cost in WooCommerce.
